abstract: Holy Frost on the Pumpkin! Parts of New York City could get two to four inches of snow on Saturday.
snippet: Holy Frost on the Pumpkin! Parts of New York City could get two to four inches of snow on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Either the calendar seems wrong or the forecast, but no, it really is true: snow is expected to fall on New York City on Saturday, and - at least for a while - stick.

headline.main: A White Halloween? You Might Not Be Dreaming
